text: Big Brother Brasil 21 will be the twentieth-first season of Big Brother Brasil, which will premiere in 2021 on Rede Globo. The show is produced by Endemol Shine and presented by Tiago Leifert. The new season was confirmed by Leifert and the show director Boninho on April 27, 2020, day of the live finale of Big Brother Brasil 20. The grand prize is R$1.5 million with tax allowances, plus a R$150,000 prize offered to the runner-up and a R$50,000 prize offered to the housemate in third place. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Big Brother Brasil seasons
